item.title: Hamrazu:Re first details, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Time-loop spy action adventure game from ACQUIRE.

Publisher Red Dunes Games and developer ACQUIRE have released the first information and screenshots for recently announced side-scrolling time-loop spy action adventure game Hamrazu:Re, which is planned for release for PC via Steam and “other platforms.”

As previously announced, Hamrazu:Re will be playable for the first time Tokyo Game Show 2025, which will run from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan.

Here are the details:

A time loop begins aboard a train bound for destiny. Each rewind uncovers new secrets, but the clock is always ticking.

In an alternate early 20th century, a hundred years of peace has endured. To mark this milestone, the Global Peace Summit is held aboard the transcontinental sleeper train the Azure Express.

Then a bomb threat reaches Chairwoman Aalia. In secret, she summons a spy, Kai Tokito, disguised as a travel magazine journalist. Into his hands she entrusts a mysterious blue gem with the power to rewind time.

As the clock ticks toward destruction, each loop brings new encounters with the train’s colorful passengers, turning chance meetings into newfound abilities and vital clues that guide him towards the truth.

When the truth comes to light, Kai’s choice will decide the future. Can he master the power of the time loop to save not just the passengers, but the world itself?

With the power to rewind time, a spy dares to change the train’s fate.

And so a time-loop spy action adventure begins.

View the screenshots at the gallery.

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯

item.title: Monster Eater first details, screenshots
item.content:encoded:
• PC

Pixel action adventure anomaly hunting game from ACQUIRE.

Publisher Red Dunes Games and developer ACQUIRE have released the first information and screenshots for recently announced side-scrolling pixel action adventure anomaly hunting game Monster Eater, which is planned for release for PC via Steam and “other platforms.”

As previously announced, Monster Eater will be playable for the first time Tokyo Game Show 2025, which will run from September 25 to 28 at Makuhari Messe in Chiba, Japan.

Here are the details:

In a city haunted by urban legends, anomalies lurk in the shadows. To survive, you must hunt them—or be consumed.

This is a city where urban legends come to life.

Exorcist Holo, who devours anomalies and makes their powers her own, arrives in this town at the request of Miya, a shrine maiden determined to save it from the strange phenomena plaguing its streets.

Clues lie in the forum “ParanormalPhenomena.com.”

Why does Holo devour the anomalies? Why does the message board exist?

Defeat the anomalies, seize their power, and choose the future.

View the screenshots at the gallery.

Screenshots

  • ❮
  • ❯

item.title: Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO DLC ‘DAIMA Character Pack 2’ launches September 24
item.content:encoded:
• PC
  • PS5
  • Xbox Series

Goku, Vegeta, Majin Duu, and Gomah.

Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO downloadable content “DAIMA Character Pack 2″ will launch on September 24, publisher Bandai Namco and developer Spike Chunsoft announced. Early access will begin September 21 at 3:00 p.m. PT / 6:00 p.m. ET alongside the release of a new update.

The pack will include the following six characters:

  • Goku (Mini) Super Saiyan 4
  • Goku (Daima) Super Saiyan 4
  • Vegeta (Daima) Super Saiyan 3
  • Majin Duu
  • Third Eye Gomah
  • Giant Gomah

Dragon Ball: Sparking! ZERO is available now for PlayStation 5, Xbox Series, and PC via Steam, and is coming to Switch 2 and Switch on November 14.

Watch a new trailer below.
